snippet.title: Teabat! Episode One - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
SHOW NO FEAR!

Teabat! is a stylish retro 2D adventure with fast, tight controls, and a large interconnected map full of secrets and beautifully constructed set-pieces!


Available now Windows and macOS!

Purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602700/ !

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeabatGame
